Caramelised French Toast
zest of half a lemon
stick of cinnamon
75ml milk
100ml double cream
30g white sugar
2 eggs
5ml vanilla extract
pinch of salt
2 pieces bread (10*5*5cm)
10g butter
50g sugar
  1. heat the milk until near boiling, then add the lemon zest and cinnamon stick and leave to infuse 10 minutes
  2. Whisk the cream, sugar, eggs, vanilla and salt into the milk
  3. Cut the bread into 5 cm thick slices and submerge in the cream for about 10 minutes
  4. Heat a frying pan over a medium-low heat, melt the butter then gently fry the piece of bread until medium brown on all sides
  5. Take the toast out and clean the pan. Add the sugar and caramelise until medium brown. Add the toast to the caramel and turn to coat all sides
Serving Suggestions
  • Vanilla Ice Cream, Cinnamon Crumble
Footer. Not much here really. Nice to have a footer though.
